document_data.mainbody:
umur the Skeptic was a sage and the First Speaker of Evernoster. Kumur was considered the most critical of his profession, as his nickname attested.
At some point prior to the midâ€“14 century DR, Kumur the Skeptic undertook a study of history and legendry surrounding the enchanted sword Namarra, and could not even estimate a likely period or locale for its origin, nor uncover any stories alluding to a time "before Namarra was forged".
